• All blood products must be traceable from cradle to grave. All forms must be completed.
• All units transfused must be recorded in the patient’s file.
• If Rh positive blood is incorrectly administered to an Rh negative women of childbearing age, anti -D globulin
should be administered according to hospital policy / specialist’s instructions.
NATIONAL INTEGRATED MATERNAL AND PERINATAL CARE GUIDELINES FOR SOUTH AFRICA
